content: **errata ** row 11 should read k5 not k4 i will edit the pdf and release an update as soon as i can a super fun stuffed bomb - perfect for throwing at those that are irritating you finished size is between a baseball and softball depending on how generous you are with your stuffing gauge is not critical to this project please note if you use a larger size needle you need to go up in yarn weight - a smaller needle helps keep the stuffing inside without gaps a small amount of crochet knowledge is helpful though not necessary - you can always substitute a small icord for the crochet chain that is the fuse this is not a huge project - i got about 7 bombs out of a skein of vanna s choice
